title: Punished for lag...
body:
If you review my game you can see that I was just clearly lagging... I got placed in the 5 queue cool down. I have really really good connection so this usually don't happen. Please stop punishing players for lag. 

NOW i know you're probably going to do the whole customer service, "well the rules/policy/blah blah blah, we can't fix this, 'im sorry' blah blah" can you not... can you just review the game, take me out of this queue.... and maybe find a way to fix how easy it is to punish a player for stuff like this...  i mean... if it bothers you guys so bad... just take that player out the game and give the other  4 players a buff... cuz this happens to everyone... it even happened during worlds last season...

replies.body: The only way to remove the lower priority queue set by [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) is by playing consistently without interruptions.  I know you were lagging and having some network issue, but even if the leave wasn't intentional it still causes other players a negative experience for being down one.  I'm happy to help with anything issues you're having to get you back in game.  Just let me know with more details!

It seems like I wasn't clear enough, it seems as though I have not made this so easy that everyone can understand. I am not having. "Connection IssueSSS" I had ----------A---------- 1, uno..... a singular... connection issue.... that caused me to get placed on lower queue.  Once again, the other players were still winning when I got back, ONCE AGAIN, no one was angry or upset, even when as a team the game was thrown (not because i left) but just because bad calls were made LATER, and even then we still got along...

You'd be as upset as me right now to, if every person who replied to your comments thought you were another player trying to dodge punishment when I could have just played the remaining games.... but it's about the principle of getting punished for something stupid, while kids are scripting, players are making people mad on purpose to report them and get them banned, players are telling kids to kill themselves... and everyone on here seems to be satisfied when things like one lag gets someone punished while everything else goes unresolved... this is not my first instance where I was punished for BS.... 

AND i won't lie I have been punished a few times for getting angry at my team, In which case I accept the punishment... ALTHOUGH the players who spent 10 years worth of effort to get me to that breaking point always go unpunished...
